panels.title: Aggregator panics [in timeframe]

options.content:
Methods: 
- `GetVerifierResultsForMessage` - Fetch verifier results for a specific message ID (consumer lookup path; used by systems that need per-message verification state) 
- `GetMessagesSince` - Discover message IDs with ready/aggregated results since a cursor (indexer poll/read path; drives downstream progress). 
- `ReadCommitteeVerifierNodeResult` - Lookup previously ingested commit-verifier node results (debug/inspection/readback path) 
- `SendHeartbeat` - Verifier liveness/health ping (verifier → aggregator heartbeat updates for ops/health scoring). 
- `(Batch)WriteCommitteeVerifierNodeResult` - Ingest a single commit-verifier node result (verifier → aggregator write path)

Notes:
- The `apiName` label is set from gRPC `UnaryServerInfo.FullMethod` (e.g. `"/<fully-qualified-service>/<Method>"`).
- The list is the complete set of RPCs implemented by the aggregator server (as of this doc’s last update).

panels.description: Time to sign the message and schedule for offchain storage write
panels.title: ⚠️ Aggregator API latency [in timeframe]

options.content:
Operations:
- `ListCommitVerificationByMessageID` - quorum checks
- `OrphanedKeyStats` / `ListOrphanedKeys` - orphan recovery
- `QueryAggregatedReports` - discovery pagination
- `SaveCommitVerification` - ingest durability
- `SubmitReport` - writing aggregated reports

Signals:
- `SubmitReport` errors/latency up → quorum may be met but nothing becomes visible to discovery.
- `QueryAggregatedReports` issues → indexer discovery slows/stalls.
